title: Captain Underoos on literature
author: VD
content_html:
The whole Mormon thing aside, Mitt Romney is seriously weird:

This summer, Romney said his favorite novel is the Battlefield Earth series by L. Ron Hubbard.

If that doesn’t eliminate you from presidential consideration, I don’t know what would.
content_text:
The whole Mormon thing aside, Mitt Romney
is seriously weird
:
This summer, Romney said his favorite novel is the Battlefield Earth series by L. Ron Hubbard.
If that doesn’t eliminate you from presidential consideration, I don’t know what would.
